content: The word that came to Jeremiah from the , saying,
“Thus speaks the  God of Israel, saying: ‘Write in a book for yourself all the words that I have spoken to you.

For behold, the days are coming,’ says the , ‘that I will bring back from captivity My people Israel and Judah,’ says the . ‘And I will cause them to return to the land that I gave to their fathers, and they shall possess it.’ ”
Now these  the words that the  spoke concerning Israel and Judah.
